title: "üîî Nofies"
description: "Nofies are your personal notifications inside Dots. This feature gathers all the updates that are relevant specifically to you, such as mentions, replies, or actions where you were involved. Nofies are perfect for keeping track of conversations, new activity, and follow-up actions that require your attention."

### üìù How to use Nofies

üîî Click the Nofies button to view all notifications related to your activity.

üì¨ Browse through the list to see new mentions, replies, updates, or interactions where you were involved.

üëÜ Selecting any notification will take you directly to the exact dot and comment thread where the action happened.

üìç After reviewing a notification, it automatically marks as ‚Äúread,‚Äù helping you keep track of what‚Äôs pending.

### üí° Tips 

* Use Nofies to quickly catch up after being away ‚Äî no need to search through dots manually.

* Check your unread Nofies first to prioritize what requires action.




New Nofies appear in real time as your team interacts with your dots.
With Nofies, collaboration becomes smoother everyone stays informed in real time, without the need to check messages constantly.
